results.title: Guru
results.creator_credit: Safina Uberoi, Pascal Guilloux and AFTRS
results.brief_description: In the West, people fall in love and then get married. In India, people get married and then fall in love. But this is not India - this is Parramatta, in Sydney, Australia…A film celebrating cultural clashes amidst a wild and wonderful festival of colour. Original format 16 mm.
results.description: In the West, people fall in love and then get married. In India, people get married and then fall in love. But this is not India - this is Parramatta, in Sydney, Australia…A film celebrating cultural clashes amidst a wild and wonderful festival of colour. Original format 16 mm.

results.title: The Drip
results.brief_description: No matter what the doting Helmut does, his wife Gertrude is never satisfied. But things are about to change. When an ever-increasing drip starts falling from the sky onto Gertrude’s head, it’s Helmut to the rescue!

results.title: Milk
results.creator_credit: Mairi Cameron, Jane Keneally, AFTRS and Anthony Johnsen
results.brief_description: The Old Man lives on his own, and has done so for as long as he can remember. He doesn’t go out except to buy milk. The Downstairs Woman lives directly below. Every evening she comes home from work, walks upstairs and borrows a jug of milk.

results.title: Odd jobs
results.creator_credit: Daniel Nettheim, Jonathon Green, AFTRS and Andrew Ryan
results.brief_description: Two Boy Scouts, intent on earning money by doing odd jobs, stumble upon a spooky old house and its macabre owner. He looks forward to scaring them with his “house of horrors” - but young boys today aren’t so easily frightened.

results.title: Roses are red
results.creator_credit: Marcella Hayward, Robert Connolly and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Joy and Di are two women on a mission, but Di wonders whether Joy has got what it takes. Joy wonders if she has got what it takes. After all, it’s not easy being a parking cop. Brian thinks it’s even tougher being a flower seller - and the last thing he needs is a parking ticket. Starring David Wenham (‘Lord of the Rings’), Kris McQuade and Jacqueline McKenzie. Original format 35mm.

results.title: Universal Appliance Co.
results.creator_credit: Andrew Lancaster, Ruth Kleinhenz, AFTRS and Michaeley O'Brien
results.brief_description: 1. An inventor finally gets a chance to mass produce his latest creation at the Universal Appliance Company factory. The production line runs smoothly until advertising and romance become distractions. Another multi-award winning production for director and sound designer Andrew Lancaster.

results.title: A Horse with stripes
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Andrew Ross and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Manicured lawns…immaculate houses…clean streets…but beneath this highly desirable exterior lurks the desperation of the bored, the scared, the paranoid and the violent. And when the tranquil suburban life of the Goldings and the Bates deteriorates into chaos, they choose not to speak about it. Winner of Silver Hugo, Best short drama, Chicago International Film Festival, USA, 1991.

Winner of Silver Hugo, Best short drama, Chicago International Film Festival, USA, 1991.

results.title: Surface tension
results.creator_credit: Karena Slaninka, Moira Moss and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Freida has something to tell Nick, but she doesn’t know what she feels or how to express it. The unspoken is the source of a tension that grows and grows and eventually must burst like a bubble rising to the surface. Original format 16mm.

results.title: The Door
results.creator_credit: Josie Keys, Anne Pratten, Jo-Anne McGowan and AFTRS
